articles.author: Dennis Thompson
articles.title: Flossing Cuts Stroke Risk By Up to 44 Percent - Newsmax
articles.description: Flossing protects your brain as well as your gums, a new study suggests. People who floss their teeth at least once a week are reducing their risk of stroke caused by a blood clot, researchers are scheduled to report Wednesday at a meeting of the American Str…
articles.content:
